SrvHeartRate
public abstract class BleService
extends java.lang.Object

Base class for all the concrete GATT service classes.

BleService

public BleService(java.util.UUID uuid)
Creates a non-operation instance used to investigate static properties in contexts where these properties are accessible only via a class instance. Calling most methods of such an object will cause an undefined behavior.

createAndRegisterCharacteristic

protected <T extends BleCharacteristic<?>> T createAndRegisterCharacteristic(java.lang.Class<T> characteristicClass)
                                                                  throws java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                                                         java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                                                         java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                                                         java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
Register a concrete characteristic class that encapsulates one of the characteristics supported by the service.

Immediately after the registration creates an instance and returns it. The concrete characteristic class has to follow certain rules. If one of the rules is not met, an exception is thrown.

Parameters:
characteristicClass - the concrete characteristic class
Throws:
java.lang.InstantiationException - failed to create an instance of the concrete characteristic
java.lang.IllegalAccessException - the constructor of the concrete characteristic class is not accessible
java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - a concrete characteristic must define two constructors: one without arguments and another with two arguments of types BluetoothGattCharacteristic and BleDevice
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - one of the constructors on the concrete characteristic threw an exception
